title: incompatibility between oc\files\cache\shared_permissions and oc\files\cache\permissions
body:
with current master i get following error message, looks like some incompatibility between oc\files\cache\shared_permissions and oc\files\cache\permissions

@icewind1991 @mtgap can you  have a look? thanks!

```
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php strict standards:  declaration of oc\\files\\cache\\shared_permissions::remove() should be compatible with that of oc\\files\\cache\\permissions::remove() in /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/apps/files_sharing/lib/permissions.php on line 86, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php stack trace:, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   1. {main}() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/index.php:0, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   2. oc::handlerequest() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/index.php:28, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   3. oc_router->match() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/base.php:602, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   4. call_user_func() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/router.php:127, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   5. oc::loadappscriptfile() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/router.php:0, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   6. require_once() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/base.php:668, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   7. oc\\files\\filesystem::getdirectorycontent() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/apps/files/index.php:60, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   8. oc\\files\\view->getdirectorycontent() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/files/filesystem.php:621, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php   9. oc\\files\\storage\\shared->getpermissionscache() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/files/view.php:794, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
[mon mar 04 10:31:33 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php  10. oc::autoload() /home/src/owncloud/web/oc/lib/base.php:0, referer: http://localhost/oc/index.php/settings/apps?installed
```
